card.name: Aerie Ouphes
card.text: Sacrifice Aerie Ouphes: Aerie Ouphes deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying. Persist

card.name: Altar Golem
card.text: Trample Altar Golem's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield. Altar Golem doesn't untap during your untap step. Tap five untapped creatures you control: Untap Altar Golem.

card.name: Antler Skulkin
card.text: {2}: Target white creature gains persist until end of turn.

card.name: Archon of Justice
card.text: Flying When Archon of Justice dies, exile target permanent.

card.name: Ashling, the Extinguisher
card.text: Whenever Ashling, the Extinguisher deals combat damage to a player, choose target creature that player controls. He or she sacrifices that creature.

card.name: Balefire Liege
card.text: Other red creatures you control get +1/+1. Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a red spell, Balefire Liege deals 3 damage to target player. Whenever you cast a white spell, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Ballynock Trapper
card.text: {T}: Tap target creature. Whenever you cast a white spell, you may untap Ballynock Trapper.

card.name: Banishing Knack
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."

card.name: Battlegate Mimic
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both red and white, Battlegate Mimic becomes 4/2 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Batwing Brume
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn if {W} was spent to cast Batwing Brume. Each player loses 1 life for each attacking creature he or she controls if {B} was spent to cast Batwing Brume.

card.name: Beckon Apparition
card.text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Put a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Belligerent Hatchling
card.text: First strike Belligerent Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. Whenever you cast a red spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Belligerent Hatchling. Whenever you cast a white spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Belligerent Hatchling.

card.name: Bloodied Ghost
card.text: Flying Bloodied Ghost enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Bloom Tender
card.text: {T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color to your mana pool.

card.name: Cache Raiders
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Call the Skybreaker
card.text: Put a 5/5 blue and red Elemental creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Retrace

card.name: Canker Abomination
card.text: As Canker Abomination enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Canker Abomination enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it for each creature that player controls.

card.name: Cankerous Thirst
card.text: If {B} was spent to cast Cankerous Thirst, you may have target creature get -3/-3 until end of turn. If {G} was spent to cast Cankerous Thirst, you may have target creature get +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Cascade Bluffs
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {UR}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{R}, or {R}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Cauldron Haze
card.text: Choose any number of target creatures. Each of those creatures gains persist until end of turn.

card.name: Cenn's Enlistment
card.text: Put two 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield. Retrace

card.name: Chaotic Backlash
card.text: Chaotic Backlash deals damage to target player equal to twice the number of white and/or blue permanents he or she controls.

card.name: Cinder Pyromancer
card.text: {T}: Cinder Pyromancer deals 1 damage to target player. Whenever you cast a red spell, you may untap Cinder Pyromancer.

card.name: Clout of the Dominus
card.text: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and has shroud. As long as enchanted creature is red, it gets +1/+1 and has haste.

card.name: Cold-Eyed Selkie
card.text: Islandwalk Whenever Cold-Eyed Selkie deals combat damage to a player, you may draw that many cards.

card.name: Crackleburr
card.text: {UR}{UR}, {T}, Tap two untapped red creatures you control: Crackleburr deals 3 damage to target creature or player. {UR}{UR}, {UT}, Untap two tapped blue creatures you control: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Crag Puca
card.text: {UR}: Switch Crag Puca's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Creakwood Ghoul
card.text: {BG}{BG}: Exile target card from a graveyard. You gain 1 life.

card.name: Creakwood Liege
card.text: Other black creatures you control get +1/+1. Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a 1/1 black and green Worm creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Crumbling Ashes
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy target creature with a -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Deathbringer Liege
card.text: Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. Other black creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a white spell, you may tap target creature. Whenever you cast a black spell, you may destroy target creature if it's tapped.

card.name: Deity of Scars
card.text: Trample Deity of Scars enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it. {BG}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Deity of Scars: Regenerate Deity of Scars.

card.name: Desecrator Hag
card.text: When Desecrator Hag enters the battlefield, return to your hand the creature card in your graveyard with the greatest power. If two or more cards are tied for greatest power, you choose one of them.

card.name: Divinity of Pride
card.text: Flying, lifelink Divinity of Pride gets +4/+4 as long as you have 25 or more life.

card.name: Dominus of Fealty
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain control of target permanent until end of turn. If you do, untap it and it gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Doomgape
card.text: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Double Cleave
card.text: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Drain the Well
card.text: Destroy target land. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Dream Fracture
card.text: Counter target spell. Its controller draws a card. Draw a card.

card.name: Dream Thief
card.text: Flying When Dream Thief enters the battlefield, draw a card if you've cast another blue spell this turn.

card.name: Duergar Assailant
card.text: Sacrifice Duergar Assailant: Duergar Assailant deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Duergar Cave-Guard
card.text: Wither {RW}: Duergar Cave-Guard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Duergar Hedge-Mage
card.text: When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Mountains, you may destroy target artifact. When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Duergar Mine-Captain
card.text: {1}{RW}, {UT}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Edge of the Divinity
card.text: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+2. As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +2/+1.

card.name: Endless Horizons
card.text: When Endless Horizons enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Plains cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a card you own exiled with Endless Horizons into your hand.

card.name: Endure
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and permanents you control this turn.

card.name: Evershrike
card.text: Flying Evershrike gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it. {X}{WB}{WB}: Return Evershrike from your graveyard to the battlefield. You may put an Aura card with converted mana cost X or less from your hand onto the battlefield attached to it. If you don't, exile Evershrike.

card.name: Fable of Wolf and Owl
card.text: Whenever you cast a green spell, you may put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield. Whenever you cast a blue spell, you may put a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Fang Skulkin
card.text: {2}: Target black creature gains wither until end of turn.

card.name: Favor of the Overbeing
card.text: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is green, it gets +1/+1 and has vigilance. As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Fetid Heath
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {WB}, {T}: Add {W}{W}, {W}{B}, or {B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Fiery Bombardment
card.text: Chroma - {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Fiery Bombardment deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of red mana symbols in the sacrificed creature's mana cost.

card.name: Figure of Destiny
card.text: {RW}: Figure of Destiny becomes a 2/2 Kithkin Spirit. {RW}{RW}{RW}: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a 4/4 Kithkin Spirit Warrior. {RW}{RW}{RW}{RW}{RW}{RW}: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes an 8/8 Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with flying and first strike.

card.name: Fire at Will
card.text: Fire at Will deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target attacking or blocking creatures.

card.name: Flame Jab
card.text: Flame Jab deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Retrace

card.name: Flickerwisp
card.text: Flying When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Flooded Grove
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {GU}, {T}: Add {G}{G}, {G}{U}, or {U}{U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Gift of the Deity
card.text: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch. As long as enchanted creature is green, it gets +1/+1 and all creatures able to block it do so.

card.name: Gilder Bairn
card.text: {2}{GU}, {UT}: For each counter on target permanent, put another of those counters on that permanent.

card.name: Glamerdye
card.text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. Retrace

card.name: Glen Elendra Archmage
card.text: Flying {U}, Sacrifice Glen Elendra Archmage: Counter target noncreature spell. Persist

card.name: Grazing Kelpie
card.text: {GU}, Sacrifice Grazing Kelpie: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library. Persist

card.name: Groundling Pouncer
card.text: {GU}: Groundling Pouncer gets +1/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn and only if an opponent controls a creature with flying.

card.name: Gwyllion Hedge-Mage
card.text: When Gwyllion Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may put a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token onto the battlefield. When Gwyllion Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Swamps, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Hag Hedge-Mage
card.text: When Hag Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Swamps, you may have target player discard a card. When Hag Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Forests, you may put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Hallowed Burial
card.text: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.

card.name: Hatchet Bully
card.text: {2}{R}, {T}, Put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control: Hatchet Bully deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Hateflayer
card.text: Wither {2}{R}, {UT}: Hateflayer deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

card.name: Hearthfire Hobgoblin
card.text: Double strike

card.name: Heartlash Cinder
card.text: Haste Chroma - When Heartlash Cinder enters the battlefield, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of red mana symbols in the mana costs of permanents you control.

card.name: Helix Pinnacle
card.text: Shroud {X}: Put X tower counters on Helix Pinnacle. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are 100 or more tower counters on Helix Pinnacle, you win the game.

card.name: Hobgoblin Dragoon
card.text: Flying, first strike

card.name: Hoof Skulkin
card.text: {3}: Target green creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Hotheaded Giant
card.text: Haste Hotheaded Giant enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it unless you've cast another red spell this turn.

card.name: Idle Thoughts
card.text: {2}: Draw a card if you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Impelled Giant
card.text: Trample Tap an untapped red creature you control other than Impelled Giant: Impelled Giant gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the power of the creature tapped this way.

card.name: Indigo Faerie
card.text: Flying {U}: Target permanent becomes blue in addition to its other colors until end of turn.

card.name: Inside Out
card.text: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Inundate
card.text: Return all nonblue creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Invert the Skies
card.text: Creatures your opponents control lose flying until end of turn if {G} was spent to cast Invert the Skies, and creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if {U} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Jawbone Skulkin
card.text: {2}: Target red creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.text: Flying {1}{W}, Sacrifice Kithkin Spellduster: Destroy target enchantment. Persist

card.name: Kithkin Zealot
card.text: When Kithkin Zealot enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each black and/or red permanent target opponent controls.

card.name: Leering Emblem
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Equip {2}

card.name: Light from Within
card.text: Chroma - Each creature you control gets +1/+1 for each white mana symbol in its mana cost.

card.name: Loyal Gyrfalcon
card.text: Defender, flying Whenever you cast a white spell, Loyal Gyrfalcon loses defender until end of turn.

card.name: Marshdrinker Giant
card.text: When Marshdrinker Giant enters the battlefield, destroy target Island or Swamp an opponent controls.

card.name: Merrow Bonegnawer
card.text: {T}: Target player exiles a card from his or her graveyard. Whenever you cast a black spell, you may untap Merrow Bonegnawer.

card.name: Merrow Levitator
card.text: {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Whenever you cast a blue spell, you may untap Merrow Levitator.

card.name: Mindwrack Liege
card.text: Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. Other red creatures you control get +1/+1. {UR}{UR}{UR}{UR}: You may put a blue or red creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Mirror Sheen
card.text: {1}{UR}{UR}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell that targets you. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Monstrify
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Retrace

card.name: Moonhold
card.text: Target player can't play land cards this turn if {R} was spent to cast Moonhold and can't play creature cards this turn if {W} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Murkfiend Liege
card.text: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. Untap all green and/or blue creatures you control during each other player's untap step.

card.name: Necroskitter
card.text: Wither Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, you may return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Needle Specter
card.text: Flying Wither Whenever Needle Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards that many cards.

card.name: Nettle Sentinel
card.text: Nettle Sentinel doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you cast a green spell, you may untap Nettle Sentinel.

card.name: Nightmare Incursion
card.text: Search target player's library for up to X cards, where X is the number of Swamps you control, and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Nightsky Mimic
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both white and black, Nightsky Mimic becomes 4/4 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Nobilis of War
card.text: Flying Attacking creatures you control get +2/+0.

card.name: Noggle Bandit
card.text: Noggle Bandit can't be blocked except by creatures with defender.

card.name: Noggle Bridgebreaker
card.text: When Noggle Bridgebreaker enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Noggle Hedge-Mage
card.text: When Noggle Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Islands, you may tap two target permanents. When Noggle Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Mountains, you may have Noggle Hedge-Mage deal 2 damage to target player.

card.name: Noggle Ransacker
card.text: When Noggle Ransacker enters the battlefield, each player draws two cards, then discards a card at random.

card.name: Noxious Hatchling
card.text: Noxious Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. Wither Whenever you cast a black spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Noxious Hatchling. Whenever you cast a green spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Noxious Hatchling.

card.name: Nucklavee
card.text: When Nucklavee enters the battlefield, you may return target red sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. When Nucklavee enters the battlefield, you may return target blue instant card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Odious Trow
card.text: {1}{BG}: Regenerate Odious Trow.

card.name: Oona's Grace
card.text: Target player draws a card. Retrace

card.name: Outrage Shaman
card.text: Chroma - When Outrage Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature equal to the number of red mana symbols in the mana costs of permanents you control.

card.name: Overbeing of Myth
card.text: Overbeing of Myth's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.

card.name: Patrol Signaler
card.text: {1}{W}, {UT}: Put a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Phosphorescent Feast
card.text: Chroma - Reveal any number of cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each green mana symbol in those cards' mana costs.

card.name: Primalcrux
card.text: Trample Chroma - Primalcrux's power and toughness are each equal to the number of green mana symbols in the mana costs of permanents you control.

card.name: Puncture Blast
card.text: Wither Puncture Blast deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Pyrrhic Revival
card.text: Each player returns each creature card from his or her graveyard to the battlefield with an additional -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Quillspike
card.text: {BG}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from a creature you control: Quillspike gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.text: Target player discards a card. Retrace

card.name: Razorfin Abolisher
card.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Return target creature with a counter on it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Recumbent Bliss
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Regal Force
card.text: When Regal Force enters the battlefield, draw a card for each green creature you control.

card.name: Rekindled Flame
card.text: Rekindled Flame deals 4 damage to target creature or player. At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent has no cards in hand, you may return Rekindled Flame from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Restless Apparition
card.text: {WB}{WB}{WB}: Restless Apparition gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Persist

card.name: Rise of the Hobgoblins
card.text: When Rise of the Hobgoblins enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, put X 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield. {RW}: Red creatures and white creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Riverfall Mimic
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both blue and red, Riverfall Mimic becomes 3/3 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Rugged Prairie
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {RW}, {T}: Add {R}{R}, {R}{W}, or {W}{W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Sanity Grinding
card.text: Chroma - Reveal the top ten cards of your library. For each blue mana symbol in the mana costs of the revealed cards, target opponent puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Then put the cards you revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Sapling of Colfenor
card.text: Indestructible Whenever Sapling of Colfenor attacks, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you gain life equal to that card's toughness, lose life equal to its power, then put it into your hand.

card.name: Savage Conception
card.text: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield. Retrace

card.name: Scarecrone
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a Scarecrow: Draw a card. {4}, {T}: Return target artifact creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Scourge of the Nobilis
card.text: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is red, it gets +1/+1 and has "{RW}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn." As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.

card.name: Selkie Hedge-Mage
card.text: When Selkie Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Forests, you may gain 3 life. When Selkie Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Islands, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Shell Skulkin
card.text: {3}: Target blue creature gains shroud until end of turn.

card.name: Shorecrasher Mimic

card.name: Shrewd Hatchling
card.text: Shrewd Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. {UR}: Target creature can't block Shrewd Hatchling this turn. Whenever you cast a blue spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling. Whenever you cast a red spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling.

card.name: Snakeform
card.text: Target creature loses all abilities and becomes a 1/1 green Snake until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Soot Imp

card.name: Soul Reap
card.text: Destroy target nongreen creature. Its controller loses 3 life if you've cast another black spell this turn.

card.name: Soul Snuffers
card.text: When Soul Snuffers enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature.

card.name: Spirit of the Hearth
card.text: Flying You have hexproof.

card.name: Spitemare
card.text: Whenever Spitemare is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Springjack Shepherd

card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {BG}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{G}, or {G}{G} to your mana pool.

card.text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0 until end of turn if {U} was spent to cast Unnerving Assault, and creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Wake Thrasher
card.text: Whenever a permanent you control becomes untapped, Wake Thrasher gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ward of Bones
card.text: Each opponent who controls more creatures than you can't play creature cards. The same is true for artifacts, enchantments, and lands.

card.name: Wistful Selkie
card.text: When Wistful Selkie enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Woodlurker Mimic
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both black and green, Woodlurker Mimic becomes 4/5 and gains wither until end of turn.

card.name: Worm Harvest
card.text: Put a 1/1 black and green Worm creature token onto the battlefield for each land card in your graveyard. Retrace
